summary:
### **Buy-Back Notification Summary (Appendix 3C) – Connexion Mobility Ltd (CXZ)**  

- **Type of Buy-Back:** On-market  
- **Total Shares Bought Back to Date:** 48,624,847 (48,324,847 prior + 300,000 on 17/7/2025)  
- **Daily Buy-Back (17/7/2025):**  
  - **Shares Acquired:** 300,000  
  - **Total Cost:** AUD 7,500 (AUD 0.025 per share)  
  - **Price Range (Historical):** High: AUD 0.028 (7/4/2025), Low: AUD 0.025  
- **Buy-Back Period:** 24/10/2024 to 16/10/2025 (may end early if max reached)  
- **Max Approved Buy-Back:** 170,628,991 shares (approved at AGM 17/10/2024, exempt from 10/12 limit).  
- **Broker:** Openmarkets Australia Limited  

*No material valuation or liquidity impacts beyond ongoing capital management.*
